translated: A warrior is one who fights; one whose living is by that is a warrior-liver. Hence it is said, â€œA warrior-liver is one who makes his living by fighting.â€ He makes an effort, makes an exertion, by fighting. It is a hell called â€œthe defeated by othersâ€ because others, having been victorious in battle, kill here.  The five weapons are sword, arrow, club, axe, and discus.
